data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Similar to Algorithm::Bucketizer, but using a different algorithm.
    I couldn't see a clean way to add this algorithm to
    Algorithm::Bucketizer, and figured it could use a name that's more
    well-known (searching for variations on "bin packing" finds more
    relevant results than variations on "bucketizer").
